p: Soil features such as organic carbon (%), total nitrogen (%), absorbable phosphor (ppm), absorbable potassium (ppm), sand (%), silt (%), clay (%), electrical conductivity (EC) and acidity (pH) were measured at each sample point. Landform characteristics of site including altitude (m), slope (%) and hill aspect [four aspects including (1) north, (2) east, (3) south and (4) west], in each sample point were recorded.
